name: Waking Nightmare (Kindly Keyin Horror Game 5)
description:
Since Will Tanner (player) has escaped from the house of keyin he has had nightmares for 7 days of him returning to the house of horrors and rather than running around collecting floppy disks now he is just standing in 1 room from 12AM to 6AM just looking at cameras and charging the generator to keep power to the house charged up and keeping keyin and a few others from getting into the room he's in but every night they get faster in his dreams but all Will is worried about is if keyin cursed him when he left so then use the curse to actually kill him in his sleep through the nightmares

This game is the prequel of The Merch Factory (takes place in between 3 and 4)

Coming soon to Gamejolt
